Beats Per Minute.description: set the Beats Per Minute [1..300]; default is 120

Beats in a Bar.description: set the Beats in a Bar [1..6]; default is 4

Begin loop command.description: begin loop(s). Ignore if it was running.

Chord creator.description: create a Chord from its string notation

Duration operator.description:
Creates a new modified musical object for which the duration of all notes are changed.
The first parameter controls the length (duration) of the note.
If the parameter is greater than 0 then the note duration is set to a fixed value, e.g. 4=quarter,1=whole.
If the parameter is less than 1 then the note duration is scaled with a value, e.g. 0.5 will make a quarter ¼ into an eight ⅛

Flatten operator.description: flatten all operations on a musical object to a new sequence

Index getter.description: create an index getter (1-based) to select a musical object

Interval creator.description: create an integer repeating interval (from,to,by,method). Default method is 'repeat', Use next() to get a new integer

Join operator.description: When played, each musical object is played in sequence

Join operator [J].description: When played, each musical object is played in sequence

Loop creator.description: create a new loop from one or more objects; must be assigned to a variable

MIDI channel operator.description: select a MIDI channel, must be in [1..16]; must be a top-level operator

Octave Map operator.description: create a sequence with notes for which order and the octaves are changed

Octave operator.description: changes the pitch of notes by steps of 12 semitones

Parallel operator.description: create a new sequence in which all notes of a musical object are played simultaneously

Pitch operator.description: change the pitch with a delta of semitones

Play musical objects in the background.description: play all musical objects together in the background (do not wait for completion)

Progress creator.description: create a Chord progression using this format

Random generator.description: create a random integer generator. Use next() to get a new integer

Recording creator.description: creates a recorded sequence of notes from a MIDI device

Repeat operator.description: repeat the musical object a number of times

Reverse operator.description: reverse the (groups of) notes in a sequence

Sequence Map creator.description: create a Mapper of sequence notes by index (1-based)

Serial operator.description: serialise any grouping of notes in one or more musical objects

Undo dynamic operator.description: undynamic all the notes in a musical object

the notes being played.description: echo the notes being played; default is false
